EXPRESSION ="TO_CHAR(IN_DOB)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="DOB_date" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="29" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(DOB_date,1,10)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="DOB" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(DOB,1,8)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="yy_mm" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="8" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="substr(DOB,9,2)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="dd" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="2" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="integer" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_INTEGER(dd)" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="dd1" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="LOCAL VARIABLE" PRECISION ="10" SCALE ="0"/> <TRANSFORMFIELD DATATYPE ="string" DEFAULTVALUE ="" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="LPAD(TO_CHAR(DECODE(dd1,01,11,02,12,03,13,04,14,05,15,06,16,07,17,08,18,09,19,10,20,11,21,12,22,13,23,14,24,15,25,16,26,17,27,18,28,19,01,20,02,21,03,22,04,23,05,24,06,25,07,26,08,27,09,28,10,29,21,30,22,31,23,00,00)),2,'0')" ="ERROR('transformation error')" DESCRIPTION ="" EXPRESSION ="TO_DATE(date_final,'YYYY-MM-DD')" EXPRESSIONTYPE ="GENERAL" NAME ="mask_date" PICTURETEXT ="" PORTTYPE ="OUTPUT" PRECISION ="29" SCALE
